word_mean: 祛痰的：促使粘液或其他液体从肺和气管吐出
祛痰药：促使粘液或渗出物从肺、支气管和气管中吐出的药物
有时泛指一切能止咳的药物(止咳药)

sentence.Network_en: The cough medicine contains an expectorant.
Objective: In this paper, antitussive , antiasthmatic and expectorant action of chenodeoxycholine acid ( CDCA ) were studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 本文研究鹅去氧胆酸 ( CDCA ) 对呼吸系统的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Aim To study antitussive, expectorant and antiasthmatic effects of Qingfeixiaoke granule.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究清肺消咳颗粒镇咳 、 祛痰、平喘的药理作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin expectorant- 'expelling from the chest', from the verb expectorare (see expectorate)

entry.def: An expectorant is a cough medicine that helps you to cough up mucus from your lungs.

auth_sentence.content: What good is making your mucus loose with an expectorant when you can't cough it up because of a suppressant?
auth_sentence.res_content: What good is making your mucus loose with an expectorant when you can't cough it up because of a suppressant?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What good is making your mucus loose with an expectorant when you can't cough it up because of a suppressant?

auth_sentence.content: "If you can make yourself drink a lot of water, that's just as effective as the expectorant, " he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: "If you can make yourself drink a lot of water, that's just as effective as the expectorant, " he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "If you can make yourself drink a lot of water, that's just as effective as the expectorant, " he says.
